name: Runners Wooden Push Bicycle - Children
description: Since this wooden bike has no pedals or training wheels, kids have to use their legs for balance and movement. This exercise encourages quicker learning and makes the transition to a bicycle with pedals much easier because they've already honed their motor skills.Frame is made of solid birch plywood.Cross country style rubber tires (12½ x 2¼in.) with inner tubes for a smoother ride.Soft padded synthetic leather seat keeps tiny tushies happy.Easy assembly kit includes wrench.Adjustable seat height from 34 to 42cm.Steer stop for more security.Comes with detachable bell.
